description.value:
You can transform into a truly awe-inspiring dragon.

Prerequisites: 15th level, Cha 17, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.X1nKy2ZPWjpuhGpO]{Major Draconic Form}

Benefit: The @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{polymorph} spell-like ability granted by @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.hSiyOkGjPlCjUiOq]{Minor Draconic Form} now functions as a 5th-level spell. At 17th level, the spell-like ability instead functions as a 6th-level spell. Each time the level of the spell-like ability increases, you create a new predetermined polymorph form that has the dragon type for this spell-like ability; this replaces any other predetermined form youâ€™ve learned for the spell-like ability.
